alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 09 at 12:44AM PST until March 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Gusts up to 65 mph in the higher elevations. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Plateau and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In Nevada, Northeast Clark County, Western Clark and Southern Nye County, Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon, Las Vegas Valley, Lake Mead National Recreation Area and Southern Clark County. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 10 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will occur downwind of terrain features where downslope wind enhancement is expected. The western and southern Las Vegas Valley and Red Rock Canyon areas will favored for the strongest wind gusts...as well as the US-95 corridor between Las Vegas and Desert Rock.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Las Vegas Valley; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
